name: badling-brawl
description: Local multiplayer duck survival game - defend your nest, collect eggs, unlock powers!

scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && echo "Version bumped to $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")"
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && echo "Version bumped to $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")"
scripts.version:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && echo "Version bumped to $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")"
scripts.zip:vanilla: mkdir -p releases && zip -r releases/badling-brawl-v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version").zip index.html assets/ && echo "âœ… Created releases/badling-brawl-v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version").zip"
scripts.release:vanilla: npm run zip:vanilla && npm run upload:vanilla
